events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been categorized under the refund cluster due to customer's request for money back.
An agent has been assigned to handle the refund request and follow up with the customer.
Hello, Iâ€™m sorry to hear about the issue with your order. I am here to help process your refund quickly.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the incorrect item you received?
Thank you for your prompt response. My order number is 123456 and I've attached a picture of the item.
We have reviewed the photo and will initiate a full refund to your original payment method within 3-5 business days.
Thank you for the quick resolution. I appreciate your help and look forward to the refund being processed.
The refund request has been successfully processed and the issue is now resolved.
Just following up to confirm that you have received your refund. Please let us know if there is anything else we can assist with.
We are closing this case now as your refund was received and you have not reported any further issues.
